ComicInfo.Title: The Cracks Beneath Your Feet Part Four
ComicInfo.Summary:
Fear spreads through Cybertron, leading more and more citizens into the waiting arms of the Ascenticon movement—making Bumblebee’s new job as part of the Guard much more difficult. Meanwhile, Chromia and Windblade follow-up on a lead, but digging up the dirt will put them face-to-face with a new foe...
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Bethany McGuire-Smith | 1 | B | Cover B | Thomas Deer | 2-3 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Jeffrey Veregge | 4 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-25 10:06:57. [CVDB715042]

ComicInfo.Inker: Ángel Hernández, Anna Malkova, Bethany McGuire-Smith
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Bethany McGuire-Smith, Jeffrey Veregge, Thomas Deer
ComicInfo.Genre: Science Fiction, Robots, Cyborgs & Mecha, Action/Adventure, Movies & TV
